Sentencas: Chromium was added to nickel/Sm2O3-doped ceria (Ni/SDC) cermets by a CrCl3 impregnation method, and the activity of the resulting Ni-Cr/SDC cermets was evaluated as anodes in ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) in the temperature range of 773 to 1173 K.
Titulo: Enhancement of anode activity and stability by Cr addition at Ni/Sm-doped CeO2 cermet anodes in NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It has been revealed that the addition of Cr was effective for the catalytic activity for NH3 reforming, followed by hydrogen oxidation.
Titulo: Enhancement of anode activity and stability by Cr addition at Ni/Sm-doped CeO2 cermet anodes in NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The optimum amount of Cr was 3 at.% of the total metal in the Ni-Cr/SDC cermets.
Titulo: Enhancement of anode activity and stability by Cr addition at Ni/Sm-doped CeO2 cermet anodes in NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, we demonstrated the improved stability of the Ni-97-Cr-3/SDC cermets in NH3 atmosphere at 873 K.
Titulo: Enhancement of anode activity and stability by Cr addition at Ni/Sm-doped CeO2 cermet anodes in NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of Cr suppressed the agglomeration of Ni, and promoted the anode durability.
Titulo: Enhancement of anode activity and stability by Cr addition at Ni/Sm-doped CeO2 cermet anodes in NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: XRD analysis suggested the formation of a nitride CrN during operation in the Ni-97-Cr-3/SDC anode, and the role of the nitride was discussed in detail.
Titulo: Enhancement of anode activity and stability by Cr addition at Ni/Sm-doped CeO2 cermet anodes in NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells
